t: The story behind the new Vrbo brand
s: March 27, 2019 - Today is an exciting day — the brand that generations of travelers and vacation rental owners have known and loved for more than 20 years is getting a new look and feel (and sound)!

t: Meet The New Vrbo: The Inside Story Of How A Vacation Rental Site Got Remodeled
s: March 27, 2019 - If you click on Vrbo to find a summer vacation rental, you'll find something new. There's a suite of new online tools to help you plan your next getaway. There's a psychedelic new Vrbo logo. And they're even changing the way they pronounce the site, from "V-R-B-O" to "Ver-boh."

t: We work with brands that make vacations together better
s: Vrbo works with a broad range of other family brands to ensure your vacations together are even more unforgettable. And we’re always finding creative ways to bring the joys of togetherness to life.
